title: Missing local environment configuration
description: The E2E tests failed because the local environment is missing a .env file with Supabase credentials. The tests time out waiting for the dev server, which likely crashes or hangs without valid credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Review .env.example (if exists) or documentation, create .env, and verify app starts.

title: UBS tool crashes on Python 3.9
description: Running 'ubs .' resulted in a TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for |: 'type' and 'NoneType'. This syntax (type | None) was introduced in Python 3.10, but the environment is running Python 3.9.18+.
acceptance_criteria: Update UBS script to be compatible with Python 3.9 (use Union[Type, None]) or upgrade environment Python.
